mapper.select: SELECT * FROM car EXCEPT SELECT car.id_car, car.brand, car.model, car.color, car.horsepower, car.price, car.mileage, car.picture FROM car INNER JOIN users_car ON car.id_car = users_car.id_car
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO car (brand, model, color, horsepower, price, mileage, picture) VALUES (#{brand}, #{model}, #{color}, #{horsepower}, #{price}, #{mileage}, #{picture})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM users_car WHERE id_car = #{id}; DELETE FROM car WHERE id_car = #{id};
